title: Best of The Herd: 11/27/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/27/2019
description:
Colin says the Eagles have had a disastrous season and are only one game behind the Cowboys and that shows just how disappointing the Cowboys have been. He explains how an 8 team College Football Playoff would be a disaster because teams 4-8 are all extremely flawed. He says Russell Wilson is better than Aaron Rodgers and it's not even close. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about Dak Prescott's season so far and Aaron Rodgers struggles against the 49ers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
